name: part_001
file: tmp_【#天音かなた3DLIVE】僕が主役でもいいですか？【ホロライブ】 [8lkam88qeZw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs 'Ghost Rule' on a stylized digital stage.
Transition period with a black screen leading into the next song.
Amane Kanata performs 'Yoru ni Kakeru' on a stage with vibrant visuals and scrolling lyrics.

subtitles.original: 育てたの　君には僕が見えるか
subtitles.english: I raised it. Can you see me?

subtitles.original: 孤独なピエロが
subtitles.english: A lonely clown...

subtitles.original: メーデー　僕と判っても　もう抱き締めなくていいんだよ
subtitles.english: Mayday, even if you know it's me, you don't have to hold me anymore.

subtitles.original: メーデー　僕が解ったら
subtitles.english: Mayday, if you understand me...

subtitles.original: もう一度　嘲笑ってくれるかな
subtitles.english: Will you sneer at me once more?

subtitles.original: メーデー　僕を叱ってよ　正直者が夢見たいなら
subtitles.english: Mayday, scold me; if an honest person wants to dream...

subtitles.original: メーデー　僕を裁いてよ　最後まで甘えてしまうのは
subtitles.english: Mayday, judge me; depending on you until the very end is...

subtitles.original: メーデー　僕を暴いてよ　もう直終わるこの世界から
subtitles.english: Mayday, expose me; from this world that's about to end...

subtitles.original: メーデー　僕と踊ってよ　最初からイナイと理解してた？
subtitles.english: Mayday, dance with me; did you know I wasn't here from the start?

subtitles.original: Wow... 嘘憑きだって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: Wow... I'll find out you're a liar.

subtitles.original: Wow... 亡霊だって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: Wow... I'll find out you're a ghost.

subtitles.original: Wow... 空白だって知るんだよ
subtitles.english: Wow... I'll find out it's a void.

subtitles.original: どうだっていい言を　嘘って吐いて戻れない
subtitles.english: Spitting out trivial words as lies, I can't go back.

subtitles.original: 時効なんてやってこない　奪ったように奪われて
subtitles.english: A statute of limitations will never come; I'm robbed just as I robbed.

subtitles.original: 沈むように溶けてゆくように
subtitles.english: As if sinking, as if melting away.

subtitles.original: 二人だけの空が広がる夜に
subtitles.english: Into the night where a sky for just the two of us unfolds.

subtitles.original: 「さよなら」だけだった
subtitles.english: It was only a "goodbye."

subtitles.original: その一言で全てが分かった
subtitles.english: With that single word, I understood everything.

subtitles.original: 陽が沈み出した空と君の姿
subtitles.english: The sky where the sun had begun to set and your silhouette...

subtitles.original: フェンス越しに重なっていた
subtitles.english: ...were overlapping through the fence.

subtitles.original: 初めて会った日から
subtitles.english: From the day we first met,

subtitles.original: 僕の心の全てを奪った
subtitles.english: you stole every part of my heart.

subtitles.original: どこか儚い空気を纏う君は
subtitles.english: You, shrouded in a somewhat fleeting atmosphere,

subtitles.original: 寂しい目をしてたんだ
subtitles.english: had such lonely eyes.

subtitles.original: いつだってチックタックと鳴る世界で
subtitles.english: In a world that's always ticking away,

subtitles.original: 何度だってさ
subtitles.english: time and time again,

subtitles.original: 触れる心ない言葉うるさい声に
subtitles.english: even if heartless words and noisy voices touch me,

subtitles.original: 涙が零れそうでも
subtitles.english: and tears are about to fall,

subtitles.original: ありきたりな喜び
subtitles.english: ordinary happiness is something

subtitles.original: きっと二人なら見つけられる
subtitles.english: I'm sure the two of us can find.

subtitles.original: 騒がしい日々に笑えない君に
subtitles.english: To you, who can't smile in these noisy days,

subtitles.original: 思い付く限り眩しい明日を
subtitles.english: I'll give as dazzling a tomorrow as I can imagine.

subtitles.original: 明けない夜に落ちてゆく前に
subtitles.english: Before we fall into a night that never ends,

subtitles.original: 僕の手を掴んでほら
subtitles.english: come on, take my hand.

subtitles.original: 忘れてしまいたくて閉じ込めた日々も
subtitles.english: Even the days I locked away, wanting to forget them,

subtitles.original: 抱きしめた温もりで溶かすから
subtitles.english: I'll melt them away with the warmth of my embrace.

subtitles.original: 怖くないよいつか日が昇るまで
subtitles.english: Don't be afraid; until the sun rises someday,

subtitles.original: 二人でいよう
subtitles.english: let's stay together.

subtitles.original: 君にしか見えない
subtitles.english: I hate the way you look

subtitles.original: 何かを見つめる君が嫌いだ
subtitles.english: at something only you can see.

subtitles.original: 見惚れているかのような
subtitles.english: As if you're entranced,

subtitles.original: 恋するような
subtitles.english: as if you're in love...

subtitles.original: そんな顔が嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate that look on your face.

subtitles.original: 信じていたいけど信じれないこと
subtitles.english: Things I want to believe but can't,

subtitles.original: そんなのどうしたってきっと
subtitles.english: no matter what, I'm sure

subtitles.original: これからだっていくつもあって
subtitles.english: there will be many of those from now on,

subtitles.original: そのたんび怒って泣いていくの
subtitles.english: and each time, we'll get angry and cry.

subtitles.original: それでもきっといつかはきっと
subtitles.english: Even so, surely someday, surely we

subtitles.original: 僕らはきっと
subtitles.english: will surely

subtitles.original: 分かり合えるさ信じてるよ
subtitles.english: understand each other; I believe it.

subtitles.original: 「もう嫌だ」って疲れたんだって
subtitles.english: "I'm sick of this," "I'm tired," you say,

subtitles.original: がむしゃらに差し伸べた
subtitles.english: shaking off my hand

subtitles.original: 僕の手を振り払う君
subtitles.english: that I reached out so frantically.

subtitles.original: 「もう嫌だ」って疲れたよなんて
subtitles.english: "I'm sick of this," "I'm tired,"

subtitles.original: 本当は僕も言いたいんだ
subtitles.english: truth is, I want to say those words too.

subtitles.original: ほらまたチックタックと鳴る世界で
subtitles.english: Look, in this world ticking away again,

subtitles.original: 何度だってさ
subtitles.english: time after time,

subtitles.original: 君のために用意した言葉
subtitles.english: none of the words I prepared for you

subtitles.original: どれも届かない
subtitles.english: seem to reach you.

subtitles.original: 「終わりにしたい」だなんてさ
subtitles.english: When I got swept up and said,

subtitles.original: 釣られて言葉にした時
subtitles.english: "I want to end this,"

subtitles.original: 君は初めて笑った
subtitles.english: you smiled for the very first time.

subtitles.original: 騒がしい日々に笑えなくなっていた
subtitles.english: In these noisy days where I'd forgotten how to smile,

subtitles.original: 僕の目に映る君は綺麗だ
subtitles.english: you, reflected in my eyes, are beautiful.

subtitles.original: 明けない夜に溢れた涙も
subtitles.english: Even the tears shed in the never-ending night

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔に溶けていく
subtitles.english: melt away into your smile.

subtitles.original: 変わらない日々に泣いていた僕を
subtitles.english: I, who was crying in these unchanging days,

subtitles.original: 君は優しく終わりへと誘う
subtitles.english: you gently invite me toward the end.

subtitles.original: 沈むように溶けてゆくように
subtitles.english: As if sinking, as if melting away,

subtitles.original: 染み付いた霧が晴れる
subtitles.english: the deep-seated mist clears.
